member.name: T:Facebook.FacebookAPI
member.summary: Wrapper around the Facebook Graph API.

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new instance of the API, with public access only.

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the API, using the given token to authenticate.
member.param: The access token used for authentication

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Makes a Facebook Graph API GET request.
member.param: The path for the call, e.g. /username

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.Get(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Makes a Facebook Graph API GET request.
member.param: The path for the call, e.g. /username
A dictionary of key/value pairs that will get passed as query arguments.

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Makes a Facebook Graph API DELETE request.
member.param: The path for the call, e.g. /username

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.Post(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Makes a Facebook Graph API POST request.
member.param: The path for the call, e.g. /username
A dictionary of key/value pairs that will get passed as query arguments. These determine what will get set in the graph API.

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.Call(System.String,Facebook.HttpVerb,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Makes a Facebook Graph API Call.
member.param: The path for the call, e.g. /username
The HTTP verb to use, e.g. GET, POST, DELETE
A dictionary of key/value pairs that will get passed as query arguments.

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.MakeRequest(System.Uri,Facebook.HttpVerb,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Make an HTTP request, with the given query args
member.param: The URL of the request
The HTTP verb to use
Dictionary of key/value pairs that represents the key/value pairs for the request

member.name: M:Facebook.FacebookAPI.EncodeDictionary(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encode a dictionary of key/value pairs as an HTTP query string.
member.param: The dictionary to encode
Whether or not to start it with a question mark (for GET requests)

member.name: P:Facebook.FacebookAPI.AccessToken
